remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个表示将为其搜索 HTTP 传输的 MIME 文本模式。A represents a MIME text pattern for which an HTTP transmission will be searched. 有关指定的 XML Web services 的协议的详细信息，请参阅[ [ \]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c). 有关 Web 服务描述语言 (WSDL) 的详细信息，请参阅在规范http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/. ## Examples 下面的示例演示使用的属性和方法公开的`MimeTextMatchCollection`类。The following example demonstrates the use of the properties and methods exposed by the `MimeTextMatchCollection` class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果已在集合中的项目数等于集合的容量，容量将是插入新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组增加一倍。If the number of items in the collection already equals the collection's capacity, the capacity is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果`index`参数等于，则`match`参数添加到末尾。If the `index` parameter is equal to , the `match` parameter is added to the end of the . 插入点之后的元素将下移以容纳新元素。The elements after the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `Insert` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Insert` method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，平均执行时间是成比例。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to . 跟在移除的元素`MimeTextMatch`移以占据空出的位置。The elements that follow the removed `MimeTextMatch` move up to occupy the vacated spot. ## Examples 下面的示例演示 `Remove` 方法的用法。The following example demonstrates the use of the `Remove` method.
